title: As a BOC AMT user I want an error if I attempt to upload a picture that is not a .jpg
custom_preconds:
Wireframe:
https://zpl.io/V4zoO1z

AC:
- If the user somehow gets around the file browser restriction to select anything but a .jpg and clicks upload the system should throw an error:

"Invalid file format.  Please upload your file as a .jpg."

title: As a BOC User, I want the Check In on Behalf Of dropdown to default
custom_preconds:
Related to #163429801

Wire:
https://zpl.io/2pn8OqM

AC:
 - When a BOC User is checking in a prospect, there will a "Checking In On Behalf Of:"  dropdown
 - This dropdown will only be populated with with Orgs that have a profile for the player in AMT
 - The dropdown will default to the Org for the version of the profile they were just viewing

title: As a BOC AMT User, I want to be prevented from checking in a player that who doesn't have any days left
custom_preconds:
Wire:
https://zpl.io/V0JDDwl

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Check+In

Rules:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Prospect+Statuses

AC:
 - If a prospect is Overdue for a specific Club, the BOC and Club Users will not be able to check in that prospect to the Club he's overdue for
 - Clicking the Check In button will display a blocking message:
**Title:** Unable to Check In Prospect
**Body:** Prospect is Overdue and may not be checked in until [**Next Sign In Date**].  Please contact BOC with any questions.
**Buttons:** OK
 - Clicking Back will dismiss the message
 - BOC will not be blocked from checking the player in for Clubs he still has days for

title: As an AMT User, I want to see a Days in Trip field added to the Travel Form
custom_preconds:
Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Travel+Authorization+Form

Wireframes:
Edit: https://zpl.io/adPMAEK
View: https://zpl.io/V1wdB8B

AC:
 - There will be a new "Days in Trip" field added to the Trip Info section of Travel Forms
 - The field will appear after the Travel Dates
 - The field will just be a text box, with no calculations behind it

title: As a BOC AMT User, I want Travel Forms to open in Edit Mode when I open them from the Travel Forms Widget
custom_preconds:
Business Value:  Currently, if a BOC user wants to add comments while rejecting or approving a travel form, they have to edit the form prior to rejection.

AC:
 - When viewing the Travel Forms Authorization widget, BOC Users will see a Status column that is a hyperlink
 - Clicking on the status of a Form will open that form in edit mode

title: As an AMT Club User, I want to be reminded when my expenses are due
custom_preconds:
The system should calculate when the Travel Expenses are due (30 days after the trip) and display this information in the Travel Expenses section.

Wire:
https://zpl.io/V1wdB8B

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Travel+Authorization+Form

AC:
 - There will be a new "Expenses Due" field added to the top of the Travel Expenses section of the Travel Authorization Form
 - The field will show the date the expenses are due to be paid
  -- Calculated as 30 days after the initial date of travel (Arrival Date)
 - The field will not be editable

title: As a BOC user I want to see additional information on the club dashboard on an iphone
custom_preconds:
Wireframe: https://zpl.io/bJZmJJ6

AC:
* The clubs should display as mobile accordions on a phone
* The club name is still clickable and redirects to the Prospects dashboard with the club filter set to that org
* Clicking the expand icon will display 3 additional fields, Check Ins This Period, Active Travel Authorizations, and Travel Authorizations This Period

title: As an AMT Club User, I want to edit and resubmit an Approved Travel Form
custom_preconds:
Clubs can edit, but they'd need to submit again, and would be required to enter comments on why its being submitted (new resubmission comments)

Wireframe: 
Modal: https://zpl.io/blL7Lge
Post resubmission form: https://zpl.io/V1wdB8B

AC:
 - Club AMT Users will be see an Edit to Resubmit button on Approved Travel Auth Forms
 - Clicking Edit to Resubmit if prompt the User to confirm their choice:
  -- **Title:**  Are you sure?
  -- **Body:**  The Travel Form will move back to Preliminary and will need to be submitted again to BOC for Approval
  -- **Hint:**  Do you wish to continue?
  -- **Buttons:** Continue, Cancel
 - Clicking Yes will load the form in edit mode and revert it back to Preliminary state
 - Clicking No will dismiss the modal
 - The modal will also have a required "Re-submission Comments" comment cox
  -- Comments entered here will appear in the Status & Dates section of the form, as depicted in the wire

Related to #161812845:
 - When a Club User is viewing an Approved Travel Auth Form, the Edit button will be renamed to "Edit Expenses"

title: As an AMT User, I want to see Check In Location Comments on the Check In History widget
custom_preconds:
Business Value:
 - When Country and Location Comments are required during check in, there is currently no place to see them in the system.  Users have requested they be made available on prospect profiles.

Wire:
https://zpl.io/VkEXRXg

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Prospect+Profile

AC:
 - There will be two new columns added to the end of the Check In History widget on prospect profiles:
  -- Country
  -- Location Comments
 - Country will be located after the Days column
 - Location Comments will be located after the Country column
 - Country will display the country selected when "Other Country Off-site" is chosen as the Check In Location
 - Location Comments will be a comment bubble that displays the comments entered when one of the following Check In locations is chosed:
  -- DR Off-site
  -- VZ Off-site
  -- Other Country Off-site

title: As an AMT User, I want to see a Help Page in the application
custom_preconds:
Wireframe: 
Club: https://zpl.io/aneoeqJ
BOC: https://zpl.io/bzLwrBA

AC:
 - All Users will see a 'Help' link in the Top Nav
 - The link will be to the right of Travel Forms
 - Clicking the link will load the Help Dashboard
-  There will be subsection on the Help page "Help Documents" that will host the documents attached to this story
- Clicking on the download icon or document title will download the document
 - BOC Users will have the ability to add / remove documents (future story)

title: As an AMT User, I want a way to contact the BOC
custom_preconds:
Wireframe: https://zpl.io/aneoeqJ

AC:
 - On the help page there will be a Contact Us section
 - This section will translate to spanish when spanish is the selected language
 - Both the Subject input and Message text box must be filled in for the Send button to enable
 -  Clicking send will send the email from the logged in users email address and trigger a green notification "Sent"

title: As a AMT User, I want prospects to automatically be checked out if they have an MNC reach Terms Submitted state in ebis
custom_preconds:
Business Value:  Prospectss are required to be checked in while they are at Academies.  If the prospect signs a contract, the Club will often not check the player out of the Academy.  This leads to a high number of overdue prospects.

AC:
 - If a checked in prospect has a MNC reach Terms Submitted state in ebis, that prospect should automatically checked out in AMT
 - A query should be run to identify checked in prospects who have an MNC in Terms Submitted state or greater
  -- A data fix should be run to check all of these players out

title: As a AMT Club User, I want to receive an email 5 days prior to travel expense becoming due
custom_preconds:
AC:
  - Five days prior to the calculated Expenses Due date on an Approved Travel Authorization Form, the system will send an email to users of the Club that submitted the Form
 - Text of email:
**Subject:** Travel Expenses Due Soon
**Content:** Expenses for the travel of  [Last, First] are due on [Expenses Due Date].  Please log into AMT to review.

title: As a Club AMT User, I want to skip taking a picture during Check In if prospect isn't present
custom_preconds:
Wireframe: https://zpl.io/V0JDDwl

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Check+In

AC:
 - On the photo tab during prospect check-in, there will be a "Player Not Present" checkbox
 - If this checkbox is selected, the user will be allowed to move to the next screen(enable the next button) and complete check in without taking a picture
 - When this checkbox is checked during check in, Club users will have the ability to upload a picture via the Check In History widget on the prospect's profile
 - Club users will only have 24-hours to upload this photo
 - After the 24-hour period has elapsed, they will no longer have the option to upload a photo

title: As a BOC AMT User, I want to add/remove Documents from the AMT Help Page
custom_preconds:
Wireframes:
View: https://zpl.io/bzLwrBA
Edit: https://zpl.io/2vPMAGY

AC:
 - When BOC Users view the AMT Help Page, there will be an edit button
 - Clicking the edit button will put the page in edit mode per the wireframe
 - There will be a browse button and drag and drop area to add new files
 - Each file will have a Title and Description field
 - Clicking the trashcan will remove the row/document
 - Clicking Save will save the form and trigger a green confirmation "Saved"
 - Clicking cancel will trigger the Are you sure, you will lose unsaved changes modal.
- Clicking Discard Changes discards the changes and toggles the form back into view mode
- Clicking Back dismisses the modal

title: As a BOC AMT User, I want to Add Documents to the AMT Help Page
custom_preconds:
AC:
 - When BOC Users are viewing the AMT Help page, there will be an Add Row button
 - Clicking the Add Row button will add a row to the help page
 - The new row will have an a file browser for the user to select the file they wish to upload (i.e. Blank Forms in ebis)
 - After Add Row is clicked, it will be replaced by a Save button and a Cancel button
 - Clicking Save will commit the changes and take the row out of edit mode
 - Clicking Cancel will remove the row and not commit any changes
